title: 96/473/EC: Commission Decision of 30 July 1996 adopting the forecast supply balance for banana production, consumption, imports and exports for the Community for 1996 (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 30 July 1996 adopting the forecast supply balance for banana production, consumption, imports and exports for the Community for 1996 (Text with EEA relevance) (96/473/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The forecast supply balance for banana production, consumption, imports and exports for the Community for 1996 shall be as shown in the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 July 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 47, 25. 2. 1993, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 349, 31. 12. 1994, p. 105.
ANNEX
PROVISIONAL BALANCE SHEET FOR BANANAS, 1996
>TABLE>
